traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The Beast has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The Beast regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the Beast takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the Beast’s next turn. The Beast dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

traits.name: Two Heads
traits.desc: The Beast has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Wakeful
traits.desc: When one of the Beast’s heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Beast makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws, or two with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
